Data Transforms.


The Data Place helps people and places thrive through better data discovery, publishing and use. We’re a social enterprise, bringing together infrastructure, data skills, human-centred design and open source development.

Human Centred Data

We put people first with services that support everyone to make more from data and create a positive impact.

Our Services >

Open Source on Demand

We provide affordable, flexible data publishing in the cloud through rapidly-deployable CKAN instances.

Our Platform >

Sharing and Learning

We're building a toolkit for working with data using design approaches and open source technologies.
